content.rendered:
Directed by Razneesh Ghai

Written by Chintan Gandhi. Razneesh Ghai. Razneesh Ghai. Rajiv G. Menon . Rinish Ravindra. Ritesh Shah

Cast Kangana Ranaut (Agent Agni). Arjun Rampal (Rudraveer). Divya Dutta (Rohini).Sharib Hashmi .Saswata Chatterjee. Mihir Ahuja (Young Rudraveer). Gyula Mesterházy (Fyodor). Hrithik Vardhan. Neeraj Pardeep Purohit. Backagaindancer (Chandarvanshi). Ashi Malviya (Kangana’s mother in her childhood). Ankit Pachori (Agent). Wayne Brett (Doctor). Titiksha Shrivastava (ITF Agent). Dishita Jain (Zaira). Sapna Agrawal (Madam). Ravi Awana (Khaled). Tumul Balyan (Pratap). Ashutosh Khare (Rudraveer’s Henchman). Gabriel Georgiou (Shamsher). Dániel Viktor Nagy (Sheikh).Mukesh . Siddhant Shukla (Traitor).

Language Hindi

Producers Zaid Ali. Zohaib Ali. Prasanth Kumar Chandran. Amit J. Chaudhary. Giuliano Doman. Alex Anthony Fernandes. Sohail Maklai. Deepak Mukut. Kamal Mukut. Anna Sesztakova. Shilpan Vyas Tinu

Production Asylum Films. Soham Rockstar Entertainment. Sohel Maklai Productions
